data.body:
Objective: Document, diagnose, and regression-verify OpenRouter support alongside existing CLI workflows.

Notes: Final stabilization wave after runtime integration is complete.

Assigned tasks:
- Add diagnostics for OpenRouter misconfiguration
- Document OpenRouter setup and pricing behavior
- Run regression matrix for CLI and OpenRouter modes
